body_html: @pavan-08 Install openmpi on your system also nccl 2.x whatever is the latest from nvidia. I've compiled tf with most of the packages and libraries, so it can be used hdfs, kafta, aws, etc. That's why is asking libmpi.so because it's from openmpi library.

body: @pavan-08 Install openmpi on your system also nccl 2.x whatever is the latest from nvidia. I've compiled tf with most of the packages and libraries, so it can be used hdfs, kafta, aws, etc. That's why is asking libmpi.so because it's from openmpi library.
